title: Integration-Provenance.Trace.Output
description: Profile-aware output for the Integration-Provenance.Trace capability.

asset_name.description: The asset whose integration provenance is being reported.

history.description: Historical integration records for the asset.

version.description: Version identifier associated with the integration event.

released.description: Release date of the integration event.

notes.description: Optional notes describing the integration event.

profile.description: Optional updated profile after applying profilePatch.

profilePatch.description: Optional patch representing modifications applied during execution.

governanceLabels.description: Optional governance labels for downstream classification.
